divs: Sighting DetailsLooking out my bedroom window, heading to bed and checking out the moon when all of a sudden appeared this star like object moving across the sky, no lights other then it's glow, now flashing lights as a plane would have but moving way too fast to be a plane, not a satelite and I don't think it was a meteor. I am always suspect and a natural debunker. There was a small cloud and it flew into that cloud so it was high up, it reappeared and kept on it's directional path and then it simily vanished.
Summary: Extremely bright, traveling fast, no lights other the solid color, not meteor or satelite or plane,
trends: There has been one other sighting in Friendsville
There were no other sightings in Friendsville on or around June 20th 2013
